checklist.title: Business Hours
content: Monitor Remedy at least 2 time per day for new tasks
Alert team lead when there is new task
Monitor synthetic monitoring and alert team lead if there are failure detected
Monitor group mailbox at least 2 per day

checklist.title: Afterhours
content: Monitor synthetic monitoring records at least once, preferably every morning
If receive alert from synthetic monitoring or manual monitoring , perform triage on failure
If a problem/real issue detected, raise an incident
If total outage or failure is wide-spread escalate to P2. Contact ASM/ESMC (see contact list) and try to get it escalated
If rejected, escalate to team lead/Belinda/Nish

checklist.title: Weekends
content: If receive alert from synthetic monitoring or manual monitoring , perform triage on failure
If a problem/real issue detected, raise an incident
If total outage or failure is wide-spread escalate to P2. Contact ASM/ESMC (see contact list) and try to get it escalated
If rejected, escalate to team lead/Belinda/Nish
